articles.description: Bigg Boss Kannada 10 Voting Results: The nominated contestants are Drone Prathap, Tanisha Kuppanda, Snehith Gowda, Vinay Gowda, Namratha Gowda, Sangeetha Sringeri, Varthur Santhosh and Michael Ajay.
articles.content: Bigg Boss Kannada 10 Voting Results: Superstar Kichcha Sudeep-hosted reality television show 'Bigg Boss Kannada' is back with its 10th season and kept the audience hooked to the episodes with new dra… [+1686 chars]
